body:
> > Can i upload this demo to template?
> 
> The files uploaded to the apache repo need to have a license, I am afraid it is not suitable.
> The community is preparing another forum and we invite you to upload a demo at that time, thank you.

ok,thank you
Closed because of no response anymore.
No enough information, I just close the issue.
@larrychen8276 union all/union had supported on master branch without sharding tables or broadcast tables.
This sql has been supported in the master branch, you can try it.
This sql has been supported in the master branch, you can try it.
This sql has been supported in the master branch, you can try it.
This sql has been supported in the master branch, you can try it.
For english only, other language will not accept.
I found explain had supported on master branch.
This problem had been fixed on branch master with this [pr](https://github.com/apache/shardingsphere/pull/11414).
Fixed by #11414.
This sql has been supported in the master branch, you can try it. Thank you.

Since @yuzhiping  deleted the configuration, the problem cannot be reproduced.
This issue will be closed, if there are related issues, please submit a new one.
This is the feature of `single-table`, we will complete the doc soon.

Hello @JiekerTime 
terrymanu reopend this issue, but did not describe the reason. Can you help verify it? Does the problem still exist?

@heysJava 
Sorry for keeping you waiting, has your problem been solved?
Hi how is it going? @MingxingLAI
Close for duplicate.
Closed because of no response anymore.
It is out of range of ShardingSphere, I just close it.
Does anyone interest this issue?
Closed because of no response anymore.
Closed because of no response anymore.

Sorry to reply late.
mybatis-plus is the ORM framework of JDBC.
Actually, , ShardingSphere community have no time to read source codes of other ORM framework, we are focusing on JDBC(or proxy) only.
So, please do some investigate, and then we can locate about SQL and JDBC interface.
Closed because of no response anymore.
Closed because of no response anymore.

Not sure, it for JDBC only for now.
It is better to try R2DBC
No enough information, I just close the issue.
I would try it later if in no hurry (focused on encrypt module now),  please assigned it to me.

It looks like cannot support sqllite.
Does anyone interest this issue?
This version is pretty old, could you try version 5.x?
This database is not for open source, we can not get the environment of this database. I have no idea to support it.

It looks like meta data loading problem with rare data type.
Does anyone interest this issue?
Closed because the pull request closed without reason explained.
Please ref the example
The `executor.size` properties is removed from the newest version(5.0.0-RC1), it is better to use cpu * 2 -1 to instead customized.
Please have a look at cluster mode.
No plan, Do you interest this issue?

Sorry to reply late.
mybatis-plus is the ORM framework of JDBC.
Actually, , ShardingSphere community have no time to read source codes of other ORM framework, we are focusing on JDBC(or proxy) only.
So, please do some investigate, and then we can locate about SQL and JDBC interface.

Sorry to reply late.
mybatis-plus is the ORM framework of JDBC.
Actually, , ShardingSphere community have no time to read source codes of other ORM framework, we are focusing on JDBC(or proxy) only.
So, please do some investigate, and then we can locate about SQL and JDBC interface.
Closed because of no response anymore.
It's same to https://github.com/apache/shardingsphere/issues/12548, please assign me. I will refactor here
Please read https://shardingsphere.apache.org/document/current/en/features/sharding/principle/execute/
Fixed now
Closed because of no response anymore.
Does anyone interest this issue?
Does anyone interest this issue?

@rfscholte you only modify first problem, 
 BootstrapInitializer.java have some problem (can't initlization) --this problem still exists, I think, you need some filter operator to avoid empty logic_db.
It is better to upgrade the new version, we may no energy to maintain multiple old versions in the open source community.
This version is pretty old, could you try version 5.x?
Can not support subquery in 4.x, please update to version 5.x and try again
No, enumerations are static only, the database types are "dynamic" which can be added via SPI
Closed because of no response anymore.
Fixed at 5.0.0-beta
Closed because of no response anymore.

@xue2lang Hi, it is not team but community.
Does anyone interest this issue?
Only text can be encrypted for now.
Because the question was resolved, I will close this issue.
Only replica can be disabled
Closed because of no response anymore.
It is better to get the best practice on configuration during performance test.
No enough information, I just close the issue.
No plan for orchestrator supporting, does anyone interest this issue?
Closed because of no response anymore.
Closed because of no response anymore.
How to understand about "but will be subject to the configuration on the zookeeper"?
The data is in database, but ShardingSphere. So there is no plan to support `LOAD DATA`

I tested with `psql`, it works, but `setDatabaseServerInfo()` will ignore `setServerVersion`, since `findBackendDataSource()` return empty result.

I'll start another PR to improve it.
